scripts.generate-graph: cd ../.. && uv run scripts/generate_code_index.py && cp knowledge_graph.json docs/viewer/public/ && mkdir -p docs/viewer/public/kb && cp -r docs/knowledge_base/* docs/viewer/public/kb/ && mkdir -p docs/viewer/public/code/nanochat && cp nanochat/*.py docs/viewer/public/code/nanochat/
scripts.start-bridge: cd ../.. && uv run --with fastapi --with uvicorn --with openai --with python-dotenv --with sentence-transformers --with lancedb --with numpy scripts/bridge.py
